    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(InetAddress address,
      int port)
       throws UnknownHostException,
              IOException
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        address - the server's InetAddress as it would appear to clients.
        port - the port to listen on.
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - when the server's InetAddress could not be inferred.
        IOException - when the underlying ServerSocketChannel could not be bound.

      • Server

        public Server()
       throws UnknownHostException,
              IOException
        Alternate constructor. Listens on the default port value Constants.DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT.
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - when the server's InetAddress could not be inferred.
        IOException - when the underlying ServerSocketChannel could not be bound.
